result.execSummary:
The defendant Mark Gerard Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation this week.
Concurrent with: Other probation being served.

miscConds.notes:
Must undergo COMPAS evaluation and follow through with criminogenic needs as recommended by Probation.

May petition for early discharge.

Restitution request to be filed within 60 days.

Restitution to be paid to the Department of Corrections.  Total of $750 will be paid out to victims.  $75 will be paid to the District Attorneys Office for the 10% surcharge.  Total restitution to be paid is $825.00.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mark Gerard Johnson

records.addlTxt: CASES: 14CF449, 13CF294 Defendant Mark Gerard Johnson in court.  Kiris Brockmiller appears from DOC.  KJB- Clerk. 1008am Unpaid financial obligations. $250/mo PP for RST beg 8/26/16 to be paid to DOC and on the 26th of e/m thereafter. turn in worksheet. 1018am

CASES: 14CF439, 14CF449, 13CF294, 13CF251. Defendant Mark Gerard Johnson in court with attorney Bruce Patrick Anderson.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 8:42 am.  Restitution to be considered as to 13CF251-DC31 request to be filed.  

14CF439-Amend Count 1 D/C (repeater stricken)-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty.  Count 2-DRI.
14CF449-Amend Count 3 to misd. bail jumping 946.49(1)(a) w/ repeater stricken-NC plea.  Counts 1 & 2-DRI.  

SENTENCE:  w/h - probation up to 2 yrs-may petition for early discharge.  COMPAS & follow recommendations.  Concurrent w/ other probation.  Court costs waived.  Surcharge is waived.  60 days to submit restitution request including 13CF251. Must report to probation this week.  PCR.  9:00 am adj.
Jury trial on February 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Information filed on both 14CF439 and 14CF449.  WFR on both files.  Def enters plea of NG to all counts and charges.  Court - Accepts NG plea on all counts and charges.  Bond continues.  adj.  9:11AM

Bond continues. adj.  9:11AM  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
